Package: grails.rest.render.hal

[Groovy] Class HalJsonRenderer

          • grails.rest.render.hal.HalJsonRenderer

          • Renders domain instances in HAL JSON format (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-kelly-json-hal-05)

            Authors:
            Graeme Rocher
            Since:
            2.3
